rand-althor.name: Rand al'Thor
aliases: He Who Comes With the Dawn

1.description: The Dragon Reborn, now whole and at peace with himself, preparing for the final confrontation that will determine the world's fate.

15.description: Meets with world leaders to finalize the Dragon's Peace treaty and coordinate the Last Battle against the Shadow.

49.description: Fulfills his destiny in the ultimate confrontation, making the final sacrifice necessary to save the world from the Shadow.

1.description: Commands the forces of the Light as their general, using his tactical genius and ancient memories to lead the Last Battle.

21.description: Demonstrates his tactical brilliance across multiple battlefronts, coordinating the complex military campaign against the Shadow.

44.description: Leads the crucial final phases of the Last Battle, making difficult decisions that determine victory or defeat.

1.description: Master of his wolf abilities and power-forged hammer, leading his forces in the Tel'aran'rhiod battles of the Last Battle.

24.description: Fights crucial battles in the World of Dreams, using his unique abilities to combat the Shadow's forces there.

44.description: Plays a vital role in the final victory, using his wolf connection and dream mastery to help save the world.

1.description: The Amyrlin Seat leading the united Aes Sedai in the Last Battle, coordinating their crucial role in the fight against darkness.

23.description: Coordinates the complex weaves and strategies needed for the Aes Sedai's part in the massive battle against the Shadow.

37.description: Makes the ultimate sacrifice to counter one of the Shadow's greatest weapons, giving her life to save countless others.

1.description: One of the most powerful healers among the Aes Sedai, using her abilities to save lives during the massive battles.

23.description: Works tirelessly to heal the wounded while also contributing her strength to the larger battle against the Shadow.

49.description: Survives the Last Battle to help heal the world in its aftermath, continuing her life's work of preservation and restoration.

1.description: Supports Rand with her viewings and emotional strength, helping interpret the prophecies crucial to victory.

23.description: Her viewings provide crucial guidance during the most critical moments of the Last Battle's planning and execution.

49.description: Witnesses the aftermath of Rand's sacrifice and the beginning of the new age that follows the victory over darkness.

1.description: A full Wise One fighting to prevent the dark future she witnessed in her visions, leading Aiel forces in the Last Battle.

23.description: Works to ensure the Aiel have a future beyond the Last Battle, using her authority to guide her people wisely.

49.description: Helps establish the new world order that will prevent the dark future she saw, ensuring the Aiel's continued honor.

1.description: Rules Andor while balancing motherhood and her role in commanding forces for the Last Battle as one of the great rulers.

23.description: Leads her kingdom's forces with skill and determination, proving herself as both a capable ruler and military commander.

49.description: Survives to help rebuild the world and raise her children in the new age of peace that follows the Shadow's defeat.

1.description: Leads the forces defending the Borderlands, fulfilling his oath to fight the Shadow until his last breath.

29.description: Commands crucial battles against Shadowspawn forces, using his legendary skill to hold key positions.

44.description: Fights valiantly in the final stages of the Last Battle, proving why he is considered the greatest warrior alive.

1.description: Reunited with Moiraine, using his skills in intrigue and politics to support the Light's cause in the Last Battle.

27.description: Works behind the scenes to coordinate intelligence and maintain crucial communications during the massive battles.

49.description: Survives to help establish the new world order, using his political experience to aid in reconstruction efforts.

1.description: Returned from captivity to fulfill her crucial role in the Last Battle, using her knowledge and reduced but focused power.

23.description: Provides essential guidance and support during the most critical moments of the battle against the Shadow.

49.description: Completes her life's work of guiding events toward the Light's victory, finally free to live for herself and Thom.

1.description: Successfully reformed the Black Tower, leading the cleansed Asha'man in their crucial role in the Last Battle.

25.description: Commands the male channelers in complex battle weaves, working alongside Aes Sedai in unprecedented cooperation.

45.description: Plays a pivotal role in the final victory, fulfilling the prophecy of his glory while leading with wisdom and power.

1.description: The legendary Aes Sedai continues her work supporting Rand while contributing her vast experience to the Last Battle.

23.description: Provides crucial counsel and Power support during the most dangerous phases of the battle against darkness.

49.description: Witnesses the successful completion of her life's work in helping prepare Rand for his ultimate destiny.

1.description: Supports Perrin in his crucial role while commanding forces of her own in the complex multi-front Last Battle.

28.description: Demonstrates her own leadership abilities while maintaining the strong partnership that strengthens both her and Perrin.

49.description: Survives to help build the new world alongside Perrin, their love having endured through the darkness to see the Light.

1.description: The legendary archer fights in the Last Battle while protecting Elayne and using her vast experience from past lives.

23.description: Uses her archery skills and tactical knowledge to great effect in the massive battles against the Shadow's forces.

49.description: Completes her service to the Pattern, having helped secure victory while protecting those she was bound to serve.

1.description: Serves as Egwene's Warder and protector, using his skills to guard the Amyrlin during the dangerous Last Battle.

23.description: Fights alongside Egwene while struggling with the limitations of his role in the face of such massive conflicts.

37.description: Makes the ultimate sacrifice to protect others, proving his worth and honor in his final moments of service.

1.description: Leads the reformed Children of the Light as a true force for good, bringing them into alliance with other forces of Light.

29.description: Commands Whitecloak forces with honor and effectiveness, proving that his reforms have created a truly righteous organization.

49.description: Survives to help establish justice in the new world, his transformation of the Children complete and successful.

1.description: A key figure in the Black Tower's reformation, using his unique Talents to support both the cleansing and the Last Battle.

25.description: Demonstrates remarkable innovation with his gateway Talent, creating new possibilities for the Light's forces.

45.description: Plays a crucial role in the final victory through his unique abilities and unwavering dedication to the Light.

1.description: Successfully forges the new alliance between Red Sisters and Asha'man, creating unprecedented cooperation in the Last Battle.

25.description: Works closely with male channelers in ways never before seen, proving the effectiveness of the new cooperation.

49.description: Helps establish the new relationship between male and female channelers that will define the post-Last Battle world.

1.description: Rules the Seanchan Empire while balancing her marriage to Mat with the demands of bringing her forces into the Last Battle.

27.description: Commits Seanchan forces to the battle against the Shadow while navigating the complex politics of the alliance.

49.description: Helps establish the new world order where Seanchan traditions must adapt to the reality of victory over the Shadow.

1.description: Continues her devoted service to Empress Fortuona while adapting to the unprecedented alliance with former enemies.

33.description: Provides crucial support and counsel to the Empress during the complex negotiations and battle coordination.

49.description: Helps the Empress navigate the new world where old certainties no longer apply and new alliances define reality.

1.description: Now older and more experienced, serving as a crucial messenger and support figure during the Last Battle campaigns.

33.description: Demonstrates remarkable courage and wisdom beyond his years in supporting the complex battle operations.

49.description: Survives to grow up in the new age of peace, carrying forward the lessons learned from the great heroes he served.

1.description: Commands as one of the Great Captains, coordinating complex military strategies across multiple fronts of the Last Battle.

29.description: Demonstrates his tactical genius in managing some of the most difficult and crucial battles against the Shadow.

44.description: Proves instrumental in the final victory through his military brilliance and unwavering dedication to the Light's cause.

1.description: Another of the Great Captains, leading crucial military operations while supporting his son-in-law Perrin's unique role.

23.description: Coordinates with other Great Captains to execute the complex strategies needed for victory against impossible odds.

34.description: Continues his crucial military leadership until his abilities are tragically affected by the Shadow's influence.

1.description: Leads Borderland forces as one of the Great Captains, bringing his lifetime of experience fighting the Shadow to the Last Battle.

23.description: Demonstrates why he is considered one of the finest military minds through his tactical innovations and leadership.

34.description: Like other Great Captains, faces the challenge of the Shadow's insidious influence on military decision-making.

1.description: Commands Tower forces and coordinates with other Great Captains, bringing his strategic brilliance to the Last Battle.

23.description: Works closely with the Aes Sedai while managing complex military operations across multiple battle fronts.

37.description: Makes the ultimate sacrifice in service to the Light, dying while defending those he swore to protect.

1.description: Continues to provide emotional anchor and wisdom to Rand while also contributing his military experience to the war effort.

23.description: Stands ready to support his son through the final challenges while serving the Light in whatever way he can.

49.description: Witnesses the completion of his son's destiny and the beginning of the new age that Rand's sacrifice has made possible.

1.description: Uses her political experience and knowledge to support the unified Tower while contributing to the Last Battle efforts.

23.description: Provides crucial counsel and coordination during the most complex phases of the battle against darkness.

49.description: Survives to help establish the new order of Aes Sedai, her experience invaluable in the post-victory world.

23.description: Though dead, her sacrifice and the information she provided continue to influence the course of the Last Battle.

37.description: Her final acts of redemption prove crucial to the Light's victory, her double-agent work having saved countless lives.

recaps.1: The Last Battle begins as all the forces of Light gather for the final confrontation against the Shadow, with each major character taking their destined role.
recaps.2: Military preparations intensify as the Great Captains coordinate the complex strategy needed to face the Shadow's overwhelming forces.
recaps.3: Rand continues his final preparations while the various armies position themselves for the multiple fronts of the Last Battle.
recaps.4: Perrin takes command of the Tel'aran'rhiod battles while Faile leads her own forces in support of the Light's cause.
recaps.5: The political situation stabilizes as former enemies unite against the common threat of the Shadow's final assault.
recaps.6: Egwene coordinates the Aes Sedai's role in the coming battle while Bryne manages the military aspects of the Tower's involvement.
recaps.7: The Black Tower's reformed Asha'man prepare for their crucial role under Logain's leadership in the unprecedented cooperation with Aes Sedai.
recaps.8: Military positions are finalized as the Great Captains deploy forces across the multiple battlefields where the fate of the world will be decided.
recaps.9: Mat begins his role as the overall military commander while the various forces prepare for the coordinated assault against darkness.
recaps.10: Final preparations are completed as characters take their positions for the battles that will determine whether Light or Shadow prevails.
recaps.11: The Dragon's Peace treaty is finalized as world leaders commit to the alliance that will survive beyond the Last Battle's conclusion.
recaps.12: The reformed Black Tower demonstrates its loyalty to the Light while preparing for the channeling battles that will be crucial to victory.
recaps.13: Communication networks are established as the complex coordination needed for the multi-front battle is put into place.
recaps.14: Scouts report the Shadow's movements as the final positioning of forces prepares for the commencement of the Last Battle.
recaps.15: Political alliances are solidified as former enemies unite completely in the face of the Shadow's ultimate threat to all existence.
recaps.16: The Great Captains finalize their strategies while acknowledging the unprecedented scale and complexity of the coming battles.
recaps.17: Personal relationships are strengthened as characters prepare for what may be their final moments together before the ultimate conflict.
recaps.18: The Black Tower's integration with other forces demonstrates the new cooperation that will be essential for victory.
recaps.19: Mat's tactical genius becomes evident as he coordinates the incredibly complex military operation across multiple fronts.
recaps.20: The unified command structure proves its worth as coordination between previously separate forces reaches perfect synchronization.
recaps.21: The Shadow's forces begin their assault as the Last Battle officially commences across multiple fronts simultaneously.
recaps.22: Initial engagements test the Light's preparations as the true scale of the Shadow's power becomes apparent to all.
recaps.23: Major battles rage as channelers from both sides unleash unprecedented levels of Power in the fight for the world's fate.
recaps.24: Perrin leads crucial battles in Tel'aran'rhiod while the physical world battles continue with increasing intensity and casualties.
recaps.25: The cooperation between male and female channelers proves its worth as unprecedented weaves are created to counter the Shadow.
recaps.26: Tactical brilliance from the Great Captains keeps the Light's forces competitive despite being vastly outnumbered by the Shadow.
recaps.27: Mat's leadership and tactical innovation prove crucial as he adapts to rapidly changing battlefield conditions across all fronts.
recaps.28: The dream battles intensify as Perrin's mastery of Tel'aran'rhiod becomes essential to preventing the Shadow's victory there.
recaps.29: Borderland forces under Lan and Agelmar hold crucial positions while demonstrating the legendary skill of their military traditions.
recaps.30: The battle's intensity increases as both sides commit their strongest forces and most powerful weapons to the conflict.
recaps.31: Egwene's leadership of the Aes Sedai proves crucial as the Tower's unity allows for weaves and strategies never before possible.
recaps.32: The reformed Black Tower's loyalty is tested and proven as Logain leads the male channelers in unprecedented cooperation.
recaps.33: The Seanchan forces under Fortuona prove their worth as allies while adapting their traditional methods to the unique challenges.
recaps.34: The Shadow's insidious influence begins to affect some of the Great Captains, creating new challenges for the Light's strategy.
recaps.35: Tactical adaptations become necessary as the Shadow's corruption of military leadership creates dangerous new problems to solve.
recaps.36: Mat's genius for adaptation proves essential as he compensates for the compromised Great Captains while maintaining coordination.
recaps.37: Critical sacrifices are made as some of the Light's greatest champions give their lives to ensure victory for their cause.
recaps.38: The battle reaches its most desperate phase as the Shadow's forces seem to gain the upper hand through their corrupt influence.
recaps.39: Heroic actions and last-ditch efforts by various champions of the Light prevent complete disaster and maintain hope for victory.
recaps.40: The tide of battle begins to turn as the Light's unity and sacrifice start to overcome the Shadow's corruption and power.
recaps.41: Momentum builds for the Light as their cooperation and heroism begin to create opportunities for decisive action against darkness.
recaps.42: The Light's forces rally as their leaders demonstrate the power of unity over corruption and hatred through their sacrificial service.
recaps.43: Victory becomes possible as the Shadow's advantages are countered by the Light's willingness to sacrifice everything for others.
recaps.44: The final phase of the Last Battle begins as Rand approaches his ultimate confrontation with the Dark One himself.
recaps.45: Heroes rise to meet their destinies as the fate of the world hangs in the balance during the climactic moments of the battle.
recaps.46: The Light's champions make their final stands as the decisive moments of the war between Light and Shadow arrive at last.
recaps.47: Critical moments determine the course of victory as individual acts of heroism combine to create the possibility of triumph.
recaps.48: The Shadow's defeat becomes inevitable as the Light's unity and sacrifice prove stronger than corruption and hatred.
recaps.49: Rand fulfills his ultimate destiny in confronting the Dark One while the world is saved through the collective heroism of the Light's champions.
